text:
Weav Music (weav.io) | London/NYC | ONSITE Senior iOS / C++ Developer |

We are a tiny team with accomplished founders building a new era in music.

Compensation: £50K – £80K Equity: 0.5% – 1.0% Location: London for now but we are moving to NYC in early 2017 and you must be willing & able to move with us.

More information and contact: https://angel.co/weav-music/jobs/129584-senior-ios-developer...
